If you wish to buy some great authentic vintage Chanel handbags for yourself, then the most obvious thing to do is to go to the nearest official Chanel store for your shopping. However, there are many smarter women out there who know just the trick of being able to get a different handbag for them for every event that they have to go to. Wondering how? Well, they go in for the Chanel second hand handbags.

We all know that designer bags are high priced and it is not possible to have a designer bag matching with every outfit that you own. But with the help of second hand bags, this is now possible. Till sometime back, people were not very convinced with the idea of buying second hand bags. But these days, for every fashionista, it is a game of survival of the fittest. Every woman wants to flaunt off a new designer bag every time she attends an event, and this, she cannot do unless she has a lot of money to buy those designer bags, or unless she buys second hand bags, which are available widely at very cheap rates.

The good thing these days is that you don't even have to look for a dealer in your city or near your house. You can simply purchase Chanel second hand handbags online at different websites. While there are some websites which have bags from multiple brands, there are also those websites which are brand specific, and sell bags and other items from that particular brand itself.

However, you must remember that since you are buying the second hand bags online, you must make sure that you do as much as possible to know about the condition of the bag before you actually buy it. You don't want to be regretting your purchase later, thinking you spent money on a bag which is in a very bad state, so it is good to be on the safer side by asking for pictures of the bag so that you can judge its condition before hand. Also, ask the seller for the original purchase bill in case they have it. This will help you to know if the bag is actually authentic or not, so that you can be saved from those who sell fake or replica bags.

Chanel Reporter handbags have been around for quite some time and remain one of the most popular styles of Chanel handbags. Out of all of the Chanel handbags that are available on the market now and have been in the past, the Reporter handbag is one of the most widely recognized, even by those that do not own a single Chanel bag. While the Reporter bag changes slightly from year to year, it has remained largely the same because it has been so successful and seems to have a very wide appeal stretching even to those that do not typically buy designer handbags.

If you aren't quite sure what Chanel Reporter handbags are or how to distinguish them from other Chanel handbags, they are commonly described as the puffy looking bags with several pockets. The look is understated by stylized at the same time. Many of the bags have an almost quilted look, although that would be quilted leather, far from anything that you would put on your bed to sleep with!
